scripts.start:
echo '====================================================================
Executing "npm run watch-docs-content" in the project root,
you get automatic content generation based on xmlui metadata!
====================================================================
' && xmlui start
scripts.build:blog: npm run gen:rss && xmlui build --buildMode=INLINE_ALL --withMock && xmlui zip-dist --source=xmlui-optimized-output --target=ui.zip
scripts.release-ci-optimized: npm run gen:rss && npm run build-optimized
